tables.title: City Street Moments
tables.description: Slice-of-life moments that can become clues or distractions.

entries.result: A food-truck vendor overhears a heated argument about missing lab samples.
A cyclist narrowly avoids a delivery van, dropping a parcel stamped FRAGILE.
City maintenance workers open a manhole, revealing an unexpected warm draft.
Tourists snap photos of a mural that changed overnight with cryptic symbols.
A street preacher shouts about an impending blackout at tonight's exact time.
A lost child holds a smart toy that keeps repeating a GPS coordinate.
A free Wi‑Fi hotspot pops up briefly; connecting reveals a hidden directory.
A parade rehearsal reroutes traffic, giving cover for suspicious vans.
A friendly dog appears with a collar cam still recording.
A police scanner crackles with a BOLO that matches an ally's vehicle.

tables.title: Case Threads
tables.description: Hooks that lead into corporate espionage, missing persons, or crime thrillers.

entries.result: A whistleblower asks for an escort to a news station before releasing documents.
A biotech startup reports break-ins, but nothing appears stolen—yet prototypes fail.
A social media influencer vanishes mid-stream; viewers saw a masked figure.
A politician's aide leaks that their boss is meeting unknown donors on a ferry.
A cold case box resurfaces with fresh fingerprints from someone recently deceased.
Security footage shows a suspect standing next to themselves at the same timestamp.
A beloved local statue disappears overnight, replaced by a 3D-printed replica.
An underground fight club posts a bounty for anyone who can hack their bracket.

tables.title: Scene Complications
tables.description: Twists to raise stakes during modern chases or interrogations.

entries.result: A sudden downpour floods the streets and knocks out rooftop snipers' visibility.
Power goes out in the block, forcing reliance on backup flashlights and radios.
A fire alarm triggers sprinklers, soaking evidence and electronics.
A crowd gathers and begins filming, making subtle moves impossible.
A police patrol arrives early, demanding permits and IDs from everyone.
Traffic snarls into gridlock, trapping vehicles in a slow-moving knot.
